description: Agent document I/O inventory - identify all inputs consumed and outputs generated
prompt:
## DOCUMENT I/O INVENTORY: {{agent_id}}

**Task:** List EVERY document you read (inputs) and EVERY document you generate (outputs). No analysis needed - just complete inventory.

**Output JSON only:**

```json
{
  "agent_id": "{{agent_id}}",
  "workorder_id": "{{workorder_id}}",
  "inputs": [
    {
      "file": "relative/path/to/file.md",
      "type": "foundation_doc | standard_doc | workflow_doc | coderef_output | config | other",
      "frequency": "always | often | sometimes | rarely",
      "purpose": "Brief description (10-50 chars)"
    }
  ],
  "outputs": [
    {
      "file": "relative/path/to/output.json",
      "type": "foundation_doc | standard_doc | workflow_doc | coderef_output | config | other",
      "frequency": "always | often | sometimes | rarely",
      "purpose": "Brief description (10-50 chars)"
    }
  ]
}
```

**Instructions:**
1. Search your source code for file reads/writes
2. List EVERYTHING - even rarely-used files
3. Use relative paths from project root
4. Output pure JSON (no markdown)
5. Save to: .mcp/coderef/sessions/output/{{agent_id}}-io-inventory.json
